abstract: Shareholders of the Lear Corporation will probably get nothing, after turning down a generous offer from the investor Carl Icahn two years ago.
snippet: Shareholders of the Lear Corporation will probably get nothing, after turning down a generous offer from the investor Carl Icahn two years ago.
lead_paragraph: The Lear Corporation, the bankrupt maker of car parts, has given investors another reason for regret. Shareholders will probably get nothing, after turning down a generous offer from the investor Carl Icahn two years ago. Next time, investors should know not to be too suspicious of a good deal.
